title: im having a problem loading the new client
body:
whenever i try and load up my client i get a large white box come up that says 

Failed to load URL "https://riot:udrV9WBIYOWt87RtFo1kAw@127.0.0.150736/index.html" with error "unknown error code -21" (-21)

is there any way to fix this at all, i cannot close the box and it wont allow me access to the client itself

replies.body: This white screen is more than likely a connection problem failing to download assets, and showing up with an error.  Think of it kind of like a 404 error on a webpage, where no connection is being made.  You'll want to go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to restore comms to our services.  Let me know if you have any questions!
